text: Taps is a 1981 American drama movie directed by Harold Becker and based on the 1979 novel Father Sky by Devery Freeman. It stars George C. Scott, Timothy Hutton, Ronny Cox, Sean Penn, Tom Cruise, Evan Handler and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Harold Becker
title: Taps (movie)
